About

This is where you can talk about yourself. Tell people what you're about, what your blog is about, and where they can find you. Consider embedding a form for inquiries, adding Google Analytics to track site traffic, or just keep it simple. This world is your oyster.

Huge thanks to ShakeyShane's starter project that bundled BrowserSync, Gulp, SASS, and Jekyll into a sweet development package. This theme's reponsive styles are bulit using Flexbox. Font Awesome, jQuery, and a few Google Fonts come pre-configured.

Get this theme on GitHub

This is my third public Jekyll theme. You can find the repo for this theme here. Stars are appreciated and coffe is coveted! Buy me a coffee here.
